mapper.select: SELECT t4.ASJBH as asjbh, t4.AJMC as ajmc, t4.ASJFSSJ_ASJFSKSSJ as asjfssjAsjfskssj, t4.ASJFSDD_DZMC as asjfsddDzmc, t4.JYAQ as jyaq FROM gxzxt.tb_st_asj t4 WHERE t4.ASJBH IN ( SELECT t3.ASJBH FROM gxzxt.tb_gl_asj_ry t3, ( SELECT t1.ZHFZXYR_ASJXGRYBH AS RYBH FROM gxzxt.tb_xw_zbfzxyr t1 WHERE t1.ZHFZXYR_CYZJ_ZJHM = #{sfzh} )t2 WHERE t3.ASJXGRYBH = t2.RYBH )
